Title: When Love Walks In
Director: The Brothers Williamson, Brad Williamson, Kent C. Williamson
Actors: Kent C. Williamson, Maggie Jones, Bill Williamson, Terri Moore
Plot: Irresponsible... Distant... Self-serving... These are the snapshots that describe John Redgrave. But that's before his wife dies and leaves him alone to raise their three-year-old daughter....
